page.title: 02RELIGIOUS BELIEFS.
page.content: Results of Questionaire of 300 people. 75% Church of England,13% Methodist,10% Roman Catholic,6% Baptist,3% Pentecostal,1% Others. 50% never attend church.60% believe the church is important.90% believe a person can be a Christian without going to church. 10% are practising Christians.75% believe in God. The decline in church attendance in many people's opinion is due to out of date services.25% said the decline was due to lack of belief and too many other interests. 60% believe that the problems of today's society are the result of lack of parental control. Over 50% thought R.E. should be tought in school. The most regularly attended church in Burntwood is Burntwood Christ Church.
